## flags() function

Lets you decode a series of `0`<!-- -->s and `1`<!-- -->s into a Record of `boolean`<!-- -->s

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare function flags<T extends string>(flagNames: readonly T[]): ComplexDeconstructor<Record<T, boolean>>;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  flagNames | <code>readonly T[]</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`ComplexDeconstructor<Record<T, boolean>>`
